Text:
When you see a DVD titled this you would expect scenes of girls, you know, actually swallowing.  Let me break down what you get scene by scene, only discussing the moneyshots:

scene 1: He almost totally misses her mouth...
scene 2: She actually swallows
scene 3: She spits
scene 4: misses her mouth, the rest runs right out
scene 5: not even an attempt to swallow, total creampie.

so out of 5 scenes, one where the girl actually swallows? I might need to go back to freshman math but to me 1/5 doesn't equal 100%

tag line is misleading and false advertisement
